mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DB_ALLPET.t_schedule_push(s_idx, s_uid, s_message, s_push_date) VALUES (#{s_idx}, #{s_uid}, #{s_message}, #{s_push_date})
mapper.select: SELECT p.s_idx , p.s_uid , p.s_message , p.s_push_date , m.s_phone_regId, m.s_isPush FROM DB_ALLPET.t_schedule_push p JOIN DB_ALLPET.t_member m ON p.s_uid = m.s_uid
